</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Which of the following are characteristics of Snowflake virtual warehouses? (Choose two.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Auto-resume applies only to the last warehouse that was started in a multi-cluster warehouse.<br>B. The ability to auto-suspend a warehouse is only available in the Enterprise edition or above.<br>C. SnowSQL supports both a configuration file and a command line option for specifying a default warehouse.<br>D. A user cannot specify a default warehouse when using the ODBC driver.<br>E. The default virtual warehouse size can be changed at any time.                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>C, E</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answers are C and E. Let's analyze each option:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
A. Auto-resume applies only to the last warehouse that was started in a multi-cluster warehouse. This is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
incorrect. Auto-resume applies to the entire warehouse, regardless of whether it's a single-cluster or multicluster warehouse. Any query submitted to the warehouse will trigger auto-resume if the warehouse is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
suspended.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
B. The ability to auto-suspend a warehouse is only available in the Enterprise edition or above. This is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
incorrect. Auto-suspend is a standard feature available in all Snowflake editions. It is a fundamental                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
mechanism to control costs by automatically suspending the warehouse when it's idle.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
C. SnowSQL supports both a configuration file and a command line option for specifying a default                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
warehouse. This is correct. SnowSQL allows you to define a default warehouse in either the configuration file                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
(~/.snowsql/config) or through the command-line option -w <warehouse_name>. This simplifies connecting and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
querying data.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
D. A user cannot specify a default warehouse when using the ODBC driver. This is incorrect. The ODBC driver                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
provides a configuration parameter (WAREHOUSE) that can be set to specify a default warehouse. This is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
useful for applications that connect to Snowflake.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
E. The default virtual warehouse size can be changed at any time. This is correct. You can resize a virtual                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
warehouse at any time. This provides flexibility to adapt to changing workload demands and optimize                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
performance. Resizing typically happens in seconds and can be done via the UI or command line.Justification: Options C and E correctly reflect characteristics of Snowflake virtual warehouses. You can                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
configure SnowSQL to default to a particular warehouse, and warehouses are designed to be scaled up or                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
down as needed at any point. The other options contain inaccuracies about auto-resume behavior, autosuspend availability, and the ability to set defaults in ODBC connections. The key takeaway is the flexibility                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
and configurability offered by Snowflake's virtual warehouse architecture.

---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Which of the following are examples of operations that require a Virtual Warehouse to complete, assuming no                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
queries have been executed previously? (Choose three.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. MIN(<< column value >>)<br>B. COPY<br>C. SUM(<< column value >>)<br>D. UPDATE                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>B, C, D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is BCD. Let's break down why:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
B. COPY: The COPY command in Snowflake is used to load data from staged files (internal or external) into a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Snowflake table. This data loading process always requires a virtual warehouse. The warehouse provides the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
compute resources necessary to read the data from the stage, transform it if needed, and load it into the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
destination table. Without a running warehouse, Snowflake has no computational engine to execute the COPY                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
command.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
C. SUM(<>): Aggregating data, like calculating the sum of a column, always requires a virtual warehouse. The                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
warehouse must process the data in the table to compute the sum. Even if the table is small, the calculation                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
needs a compute resource, which is the virtual warehouse. In the absence of a running warehouse, no                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
computation on table data can take place.D. UPDATE: Updating data in a Snowflake table always requires a virtual warehouse. The UPDATE command                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
modifies existing data within a table. This operation necessitates compute resources to locate the records to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
be modified, apply the changes, and write the updated data back to storage. Without a virtual warehouse, the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
UPDATE command cannot be executed as it relies on computational power to perform the data manipulation.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Why A is incorrect:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
A. MIN(<< column value >>): While seemingly similar to SUM, MIN when executed on a column of a small                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
table that fits into Snowflake's metadata cache might be able to return a result without spinning up a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
warehouse. This is highly dependent on pre-existing warehouse activity and the internal optimization strategy                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
that Snowflake chooses. Snowflake's metadata layer can store some aggregate statistics on data. If a query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
only accesses metadata (as could happen for very small tables), it might avoid using a warehouse. However,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
the explicit assumption is "no queries have been executed previously" meaning the metadata may not even be                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
populated with these stats, so even this case is highly unlikely. The other options (COPY, SUM, UPDATE)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
always require a warehouse. Because this question asks for examples, picking those which definitively will                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
always need a warehouse is a better approach. This is a rare, edge case. Therefore, A is incorrect in most                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
realistic scenarios and especially when the context is "no queries have been executed previously".                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
In summary, COPY, SUM, and UPDATE operations unequivocally necessitate a virtual warehouse to provide                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
the compute resources needed for data loading, aggregation, and modification, respectively. Option A is less                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
conclusive.

Snowflake COPY command: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/sql/copy-into-table                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
</details>

A virtual warehouse is created using the following command:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Create warehouse my_WH with warehouse_size = MEDIUM                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
min_cluster_count = 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
max_cluster_count = 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
auto_suspend = 60                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
auto_resume = true;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
The image below is a graphical representation of the warehouse utilization across two days.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
What action should be taken to address this situation?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Increase the warehouse size from Medium to 2XL.<br>B. Increase the value for the parameter MAX_CONCURRENCY_LEVEL.<br>C. Configure the warehouse to a multi-cluster warehouse.<br>D. Lower the value of the parameter STATEMENT_QUEUED_TIMEOUT_IN_SECONDS.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
C. This is particularly useful if multiple users or queries are running simultaneously, causing

---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
What Snowflake features allow virtual warehouses to handle high concurrency workloads? (Choose two.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. The ability to scale up warehouses<br>B. The use of warehouse auto scaling<br>C. The ability to resize warehouses<br>D. Use of multi-clustered warehouses<br>E. The use of warehouse indexing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>B, D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is B and D. Let's break down why:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
B. The use of warehouse auto scaling: Auto-scaling is a core feature specifically designed to handle                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
concurrency. Snowflake's auto-scaling dynamically adjusts the number of active clusters in a multi-cluster                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
warehouse based on the workload. As demand increases (more concurrent queries), Snowflake automatically                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
spins up additional clusters to distribute the load, preventing queuing and maintaining performance.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Conversely, as demand decreases, clusters are automatically suspended to optimize cost. This dynamic                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
adjustment ensures the system can handle fluctuating levels of concurrency efficiently.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
D. Use of multi-clustered warehouses: Multi-cluster warehouses are designed to improve concurrency and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
availability. By having multiple independent compute clusters sharing access to the same data, Snowflake can                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
distribute the workload across these clusters. When a query is submitted, Snowflake intelligently routes it to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
an available cluster. This prevents a single cluster from becoming overloaded when many queries are                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
submitted simultaneously. This parallel processing significantly boosts the system's ability to handle high                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
concurrency without performance degradation. Each cluster functions as an independent compute resource,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
making the warehouse scalable.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
Why other options are not the best fit:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
A. The ability to scale up warehouses: Scaling up a warehouse (increasing its size) increases the compute                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
power of a single cluster. While this can improve the performance of individual queries, it doesn't directly                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
address concurrency issues. A larger warehouse will still face queuing problems if multiple users are                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
submitting queries at the same time and could be less cost effective than scaling out.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
C. The ability to resize warehouses: Resizing a warehouse, like scaling up, primarily focuses on increasing the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
resources available to a single cluster. While this can benefit performance, it doesn't inherently address                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
concurrency, the ability to handle many concurrent queries.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
E. The use of warehouse indexing: Snowflake does not expose indexing to the user. Snowflake uses its                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
internal columnar storage for optimization of queries.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
In summary, auto-scaling enables dynamic adjustment of compute resources, while multi-clustered                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
warehouses facilitate parallel processing, making them both essential features for handling high concurrency                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
workloads in Snowflake.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Authoritative Links:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Snowflake Multi-Cluster Warehouses: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/warehouses-multicluster                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Snowflake Auto-Scaling: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/warehouses-considerations                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
When should a multi-cluster warehouse be used in auto-scaling mode?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. When it is unknown how much compute power is needed<br>B. If the select statement contains a large number of temporary tables or Common Table Expressions (CTEs)<br>C. If the runtime of the executed query is very slow<br>D. When a large number of concurrent queries are run on the same warehouse
