<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is D. When a large number of concurrent queries are run on the same warehouse. Here's                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
why:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Multi-cluster warehouses in Snowflake, especially when configured for auto-scaling, are designed to handle                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
fluctuating workloads and high concurrency. When many users or applications submit queries simultaneously,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
a single warehouse might become overloaded, leading to queuing and performance degradation. Auto-scaling                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
addresses this by dynamically adding more compute clusters to the warehouse as demand increases. This                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
allows Snowflake to parallelize query execution across these clusters, ensuring that queries are processed                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
efficiently without bottlenecks. The goal is to maintain consistent performance, even when handling a high                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
volume of concurrent requests. The other options do not directly correlate with the primary use case of multicluster warehouses. While 'A' addresses uncertainty about compute needs, it doesn't specifically necessitate                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
multi-cluster setup, as a single auto-scaling warehouse could suffice. Options 'B' and 'C' address query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
complexity and performance respectively, which can be addressed by other Snowflake features and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
warehouse sizing, rather than necessitating multi-cluster functionality. Multi-cluster auto-scaling's strength                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
lies in managing concurrent workload spikes, not inherent query characteristics or execution speed.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Therefore, the primary use case for multi-cluster warehouses in auto-scaling mode is to handle concurrent                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
workloads and maintain query performance under heavy load. It enables Snowflake to automatically scale                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
resources based on demand, improving throughput and minimizing wait times for concurrent users and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
queries.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Further Research:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Snowflake Documentation on Multi-cluster Warehouses: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/userguide/warehouses-multicluster                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Snowflake Documentation on Auto-scaling: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/warehouses-autoscaling                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
When reviewing the load for a warehouse using the load monitoring chart, the chart indicates that a high volume of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
queries is always queuing in the warehouse.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Use multi-clustered warehousing to scale out warehouse capacity.<br>B. Scale up the warehouse size to allow queries to execute faster.<br>C. Stop and start the warehouse to clear the queued queries.<br>D. Migrate some queries to a new warehouse to reduce load.<br>E. Limit user access to the warehouse so fewer queries are run against it.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>A, D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is A and D. Here's a detailed justification:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The primary issue is query queuing, which indicates the warehouse is overloaded and unable to process                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
queries as quickly as they arrive. The goal is to increase processing capacity or distribute the load more                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
effectively.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
A. Use multi-clustered warehousing to scale out warehouse capacity: Multi-clustering allows a warehouse                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
to automatically scale out by adding more compute resources (clusters) when the load increases. This is ideal                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
for handling concurrent query loads because it provides parallel processing capabilities. Each cluster can                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
handle a subset of the queries, significantly reducing queuing and improving overall performance.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Snowflake's auto-scale feature handles this automatically. Snowflake Multi-Cluster Warehouses                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
D. Migrate some queries to a new warehouse to reduce load: This involves splitting the workload across                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
multiple warehouses. By routing some queries to a separate warehouse, the load on the original warehouse is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
reduced, thereby decreasing the number of queries queuing. This strategy is especially effective if different                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
query workloads have different resource requirements (e.g., one set is CPU-intensive, and another is I/Ointensive). This approach promotes resource isolation. For instance, extract/load/transform (ELT) processes                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
could run on one warehouse while reporting and dashboarding queries run on another.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Why other options are incorrect:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
B. Scale up the warehouse size to allow queries to execute faster: While scaling up can help individual                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
queries execute faster, it primarily addresses slow query execution time rather than query queuing. Scaling                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
up alone might not be sufficient if the number of concurrent queries is the root cause of the queuing problem.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
It's also generally more cost-effective to scale out rather than scale up, as you only pay for the additional                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
resources when you need them.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
C. Stop and start the warehouse to clear the queued queries: This is a short-sighted solution. While it might                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
temporarily alleviate the issue by clearing the queue, the problem will quickly resurface if the warehouse is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
still overloaded. It doesn't address the underlying capacity constraints.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
E. Limit user access to the warehouse so fewer queries are run against it: This is an undesirable and often                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
impractical solution. It restricts access to data and functionality, which negatively impacts business                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
operations. The goal should be to provide adequate resources to handle the workload, not to limit access. A                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
better strategy involves optimizing queries and scaling resources.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
In an auto-scaling multi-cluster virtual warehouse with the setting SCALING_POLICY = ECONOMY enabled, when                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
is another cluster started?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. When the system has enough load for 2 minutes<br>B. When the system has enough load for 6 minutes<br>C. When the system has enough load for 8 minutes<br>D. When the system has enough load for 10 minutes                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>B</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is B. When SCALING_POLICY is set to ECONOMY, Snowflake prioritizes minimizing costs                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
over performance. This means it will be more conservative in starting new clusters. Snowflake initiates a new                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
cluster in an auto-scaling multi-cluster warehouse operating under the ECONOMY scaling policy only after                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
sustained load persists for a specific duration. This delay helps avoid unnecessary cluster spin-ups due to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
transient spikes in workload. The wait time is designed to ensure the additional cluster is genuinely required                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
and not just a temporary fluctuation. The documentation (https://docs.snowflake.com/en/userguide/warehouses-multicluster.html#scaling-policy) specifies that with the ECONOMY scaling policy, a new                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
cluster starts when there's enough load for 6 minutes. This contrasts with the STANDARD policy, which starts                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
a new cluster after a shorter period (around 2 minutes), aiming for immediate performance at potentially                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
higher costs. By waiting 6 minutes, Snowflake ensures that the resource demand is truly persistent before                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
provisioning a new cluster, leading to better cost optimization. Options A, C, and D are incorrect because they                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
do not reflect Snowflake's documented behavior for the ECONOMY scaling policy regarding the time                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
threshold for starting a new cluster.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
What happens when a virtual warehouse is resized?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. When increasing the size of an active warehouse the compute resource for all running and queued queries on<br>B. When reducing the size of a warehouse the compute resources are removed only when they are no longer<br>C. The warehouse will be suspended while the new compute resource is provisioned and will resume<br>D. Users who are trying to use the warehouse will receive an error message until the resizing is complete.                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>B</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is B. When resizing a Snowflake virtual warehouse, the system employs a non-disruptive                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
approach, especially when scaling down. If a warehouse's size is reduced, Snowflake doesn't immediately                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
terminate compute resources actively processing queries. Instead, it waits until all ongoing queries have                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
finished using those resources before reclaiming them. This ensures that active workloads are not interrupted.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
Option A is incorrect because resizing up affects only new queries and queued queries, not the running                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
queries. Option C is incorrect as warehouse resizing does not lead to a suspension. The compute resources are                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
added or removed in the background while the warehouse remains active. Option D is also wrong as users can                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
continue to use the warehouse during a resize operation, with the exception of the small delay during scaling                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
up mentioned in option A. Therefore, option B accurately reflects how Snowflake manages compute resource                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
deallocation during a warehouse resizing operation, promoting continuous availability and query execution.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
This behavior aligns with the cloud's principles of elasticity and dynamic resource management.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
For more details, refer to the official Snowflake documentation:https://docs.snowflake.com/en/userguide/warehouses-resizing.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
If a size Small virtual warehouse is made up of two servers, how many servers make up a Large warehouse?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. 4<br>B. 8<br>C. 16<br>D. 32                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>B</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Snowflake's virtual warehouses scale by doubling the number of servers with each size increment. A Small                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
warehouse, comprised of two servers, serves as the baseline for understanding this scaling pattern. Following                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
this doubling progression, a Medium warehouse contains four servers (2 2), a Large warehouse consists of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
eight servers (4 2), an X-Large warehouse has 16 servers (8 * 2), and so on. Therefore, a Large warehouse,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
succeeding the Medium, utilizes twice the number of servers that a Medium warehouse does. This consistent                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
doubling is fundamental to Snowflake's scaling architecture, enabling rapid performance adjustments.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
The size of a warehouse directly impacts its computational power and the resources available for executing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
queries. Higher sizes translate to more servers, leading to increased concurrency and faster processing of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
larger datasets. This makes understanding the scaling behavior crucial for optimizing performance and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
controlling costs within Snowflake. Selecting the correct warehouse size is a critical aspect of efficient                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
resource management. This scalability allows for workloads to be adjusted based on demands without                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
requiring architectural changes. The documentation provides a clear explanation of the size-based
