progression that supports this scaling behavior.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Authoritative Link: Snowflake Warehouse Sizing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
What is a responsibility of Snowflake’s virtual warehouses?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Infrastructure management<br>B. Metadata management<br>C. Query execution<br>D. Query parsing and optimization<br>E. Management of the storage layer                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is C, Query execution. Snowflake's architecture separates compute (virtual warehouses)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
from storage. Virtual warehouses are essentially clusters of compute resources that perform the data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
processing tasks within Snowflake.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
A key responsibility of these warehouses is to execute queries submitted by users or applications. When a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
user runs a SQL query, Snowflake's query optimizer determines the most efficient execution plan. This plan is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
then handed off to a virtual warehouse to perform the actual computation, including retrieving data from                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
storage, performing aggregations, applying filters, and ultimately generating the query result.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
Option A, Infrastructure management, is incorrect because Snowflake manages the underlying infrastructure,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
abstracting it away from the user. The user simply specifies the size of the warehouse they need.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Option B, Metadata management, is also incorrect. Snowflake's metadata management is handled separately,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
tracking information about tables, schemas, and other database objects, enabling efficient data discovery and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
query planning.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
Option D, Query parsing and optimization, while related to query execution, is generally handled by                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Snowflake's query optimizer before the query is sent to the virtual warehouse for execution. The warehouse                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
executes the optimized query plan.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Option E, Management of the storage layer, is incorrect because Snowflake's storage layer is independent of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
the virtual warehouses. The storage layer stores the data in a columnar format, and the virtual warehouses                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
access the data from this layer. The data is stored in a cloud storage solution, and Snowflake's services                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
handle the storage management.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
In summary, virtual warehouses are the workhorses that perform the computations needed to answer user                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
queries, making query execution their primary responsibility. The cloud-native architecture of Snowflake                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
means compute resources can be scaled independently from storage, allowing for efficient resource                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
utilization and cost optimization.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
For further research, consult the official Snowflake documentation:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Snowflake Virtual Warehouses                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Snowflake Architecture                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Which of the following operations require the use of a running virtual warehouse? (Choose two.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Downloading data from an internal stage<br>B. Listing files in a stage<br>C. Executing a stored procedure<br>D. Altering a table<br>E. Querying data from a materialized view                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>C, E</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Here's a detailed justification for why options C (Executing a stored procedure) and E (Querying data from a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
materialized view) require a running virtual warehouse in Snowflake, while options A, B, and D do not always                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
need a running warehouse:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Executing a Stored Procedure (C): Stored procedures in Snowflake are typically written in SQL or procedural                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
languages (like JavaScript or Java). They perform computations and data manipulations. To execute these                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
operations, a virtual warehouse must be active to provide the necessary compute resources (CPU, memory,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
and I/O) to process the code and interact with the data. Without an active warehouse, the execution engine                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
has no computational power.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Querying Data from a Materialized View (E): Materialized views store precomputed results of a query. While                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
the data is precomputed, accessing this data requires a warehouse to serve the results. The warehouse                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
provides the necessary resources to retrieve the data from storage and deliver it to the user or application                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
requesting it. In essence, querying a materialized view is still a query operation, just against pre-computed                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
data.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
Downloading data from an internal stage (A): Downloading data from an internal stage (provided the files are                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
relatively small) can often be managed by Snowflake's cloud services layer without needing an active                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
warehouse. The operation primarily involves data retrieval and transfer. However, very large files might                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
indirectly engage a warehouse in the background for optimized handling.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Listing files in a stage (B): Listing files in a stage primarily involves querying the metadata of the stage (file                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
names, sizes, etc.). This operation is usually handled by the cloud services layer and typically does not require                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
a running warehouse. The information about the files is part of the stage's metadata, which is managed                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
separately from the data processing layer.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
Altering a table (D): Altering a table (e.g., adding a column, changing a data type) doesn't always necessitate                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
a running warehouse immediately. Some metadata changes can be handled by the cloud services layer.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
However, if the alteration involves data transformations or significant restructuring, a warehouse will be                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
required to process the data changes, potentially happening asynchronously.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
In conclusion, Stored Procedures and Materialized Views require compute power to execute and serve results,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
respectively. Altering a table (depending on the type of alteration), downloading files, and listing files might                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
sometimes, but do not always, require a running warehouse. Therefore, C and E are the most appropriate                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
answers.

Snowflake Documentation on Materialized Views: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/viewsmaterialized.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
When can a newly configured virtual warehouse start running SQL queries?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. After 50% of the warehouse provisioning has completed<br>B. During the time slots defined by the ACCOUNTADMIN<br>C. When the warehouse provisioning is completed<br>D. After the warehouse replication is completed                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is C. When the warehouse provisioning is completed.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
A virtual warehouse in Snowflake cannot execute SQL queries until it has been fully provisioned. Provisioning                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
encompasses the allocation and configuration of the compute resources (virtual machines) required to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
operate the warehouse. Think of it as the process of setting up the engine and fuel before a car can run.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Options A, B, and D are incorrect because they describe intermediary states or unrelated processes. A                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
warehouse isn't operational at 50% provisioning. The ACCOUNTADMIN defines resource monitors and other                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
governance policies, but doesn't directly define when a warehouse is provisioned. Replication is a data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
movement and availability concept, not directly tied to initial warehouse startup. A warehouse must be                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
functional before it can be replicated to another region.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Snowflake's architecture ensures that resources are fully available and configured before allowing any                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
queries to be executed against the warehouse. This ensures data consistency, prevents partial results, and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
guarantees a baseline performance level. The system needs to be ready to handle workloads before                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
accepting any queries. It is a basic operational requirement.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
For more information on warehouse provisioning and management in Snowflake, refer to the official                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Snowflake documentation:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Virtual Warehouses: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/warehouses-overview                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Creating and Configuring Virtual Warehouses: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/sql/createwarehouse                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
If all virtual warehouse resources are maximized while processing a query workload, what will happen to new                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
queries that are submitted to the warehouse?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. All queries will terminate when the resources are maximized.<br>B. The warehouse will scale out automatically<br>C. The warehouse will move to a suspended state.<br>D. New queries will be queued and executed when capacity is available.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is D: New queries will be queued and executed when capacity is available.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Snowflake's virtual warehouses are designed to handle concurrency. When a virtual warehouse is fully                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
utilizing its resources (CPU, memory, I/O) due to existing query processing, it doesn't simply reject new                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
queries or terminate existing ones. Instead, Snowflake implements a queuing mechanism. New incoming                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
queries are placed in a queue, waiting for resources to become available. This ensures that queries are not                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
lost or dropped, but rather processed in the order they are received, as soon as the warehouse has sufficient                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
capacity.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Option A is incorrect because Snowflake prioritizes completing the queries it's already processing. Option B                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
might be considered depending on autoscaling configuration, but the immediate action is queuing.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Autoscaling takes time to provision additional resources. If autoscaling is disabled or still provisioning, the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
queries will still be queued. Option C is incorrect as the warehouse remains active, just fully utilized. It only                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
suspends when idle (based on auto-suspend settings) or when explicitly suspended.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
This queuing behavior is a crucial aspect of Snowflake's workload management. It prevents resource                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
contention from causing query failures and helps maintain system stability during periods of high demand.
