---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Which statement describes when a virtual warehouse can be resized?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. A resize will affect running, queued, and new queries.<br>B. A resize can only be completed when the warehouse is in an auto-resume status.<br>C. A resize must be completed when the warehouse is suspended.<br>D. A resize can be completed at any time.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is D. A resize can be completed at any time. This is because Snowflake's architecture is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
designed for dynamic resource allocation. Virtual warehouses, which provide the compute power for                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Snowflake operations, can be resized on-the-fly without requiring downtime or disrupting active operations.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
This flexibility is a core tenet of cloud-based data warehousing, allowing users to adjust resources to meet                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
varying workloads. Unlike traditional systems, Snowflake doesn't demand a pause or suspension for resizing;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
instead, it manages the transition seamlessly. The resizing process starts by provisioning the target                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
warehouse size, and new queries are immediately routed to the new infrastructure. Concurrently, existing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
running queries are allowed to complete on the current warehouse. Queued queries and those initiated after                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
the resize starts use the newly configured size. This near-instantaneous adjustment is a significant advantage,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
enabling users to quickly scale up for demanding tasks and scale down to control costs during low activity                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
periods. The independence of compute from storage is a foundational feature supporting this capability. The                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
ability to resize at any time ensures that applications and users experience optimal performance and resource                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
utilization, directly reflecting Snowflake's elastic and scalable nature.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Further research can be done on Snowflake's documentation:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
Resizing a Warehouse                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Understanding How Warehouse Sizing Works in Snowflake                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Several users are using the same virtual warehouse. The users report that the queries are running slowly, and that                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
many queries are being queued.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
What is the recommended way to resolve this issue?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Reduce the warehouse STATEMENT_QUEUED_TIMEOUT_IN SECONDS parameter.<br>B. Reduce the warehouse AUTO_SUSPEND parameter.<br>C. Increase the warehouse MAX_CONCURRENCY_LIMIT parameter.<br>D. Increase the warehouse MAX_CLUSTER_COUNT parameter.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is D. Increase the warehouse MAX_CLUSTER_COUNT parameter.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Here's why: The problem description clearly indicates a resource contention issue: queries are running slowly                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
and being queued. This signifies that the current virtual warehouse is unable to handle the concurrent                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
workload demands.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Let's analyze why the other options are incorrect:A. Reduce the warehouse STATEMENT_QUEUED_TIMEOUT_IN SECONDS parameter: This parameter                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
determines how long a query waits in the queue before timing out. Reducing this doesn't solve the underlying                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
resource constraint; it merely shortens the wait time before failure, potentially leading to more user                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
frustration. It doesn't address the queuing issue itself.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
B. Reduce the warehouse AUTO_SUSPEND parameter: The AUTO_SUSPEND parameter dictates the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
inactivity period before a warehouse suspends itself to save costs. Altering this will not solve the query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
performance or queuing problems. It solely manages warehouse uptime, not its ability to process workload.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
C. Increase the warehouse MAX_CONCURRENCY_LIMIT parameter: This parameter controls the number of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
concurrent queries that can run within a single cluster of a multi-cluster warehouse. While it might help to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
some extent, if the single cluster is already maxed out in terms of resources, increasing this limit won't                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
address the core issue which is having the needed compute capacity and not simply allowing more queries on                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
the same limited compute resources.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Option D directly tackles the core issue: increasing MAX_CLUSTER_COUNT. Snowflake's multi-cluster                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
warehouses scale horizontally by adding more clusters, increasing the available compute capacity. When                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
there's a backlog of queries, adding clusters allows more queries to run in parallel and prevents queuing and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
latency issues. By increasing the maximum number of clusters, Snowflake can dynamically scale up the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
compute power of the warehouse, addressing the performance bottleneck and reducing query wait times.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
This is the fundamental concept of horizontal scaling. Therefore, increasing MAX_CLUSTER_COUNT is the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
most recommended action for this scenario.

warehouse creation including those discussed above.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
What happens when the size of a virtual warehouse is changed?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Queries that are running on the current warehouse configuration are not impacted.<br>B. Queries that are running on the current warehouse configuration are aborted and have to be resubmitted by<br>C. Queries that are running on the current warehouse configuration are aborted and are automatically<br>D. Queries that are running on the current warehouse configuration are moved to the new configuration and                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>A</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is A. When the size of a Snowflake virtual warehouse is changed (scaled up or down),                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
currently running queries are not impacted. This is a key aspect of Snowflake's architecture and is designed                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
to provide minimal disruption to ongoing workloads.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Snowflake achieves this by ensuring that the compute resources used by existing queries remain isolated                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
within the original warehouse configuration. The scaling operation creates a new warehouse with the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
requested size. New queries will then be routed to this newly sized warehouse, while existing queries continue                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
to execute on the initial configuration until they complete. This approach ensures transactional consistency                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
and prevents unexpected query failures or data corruption. The user does not need to resubmit queries                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
manually (ruling out B) nor are they automatically resubmitted (ruling out C). Additionally, the compute                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
resources used by queries do not magically "move" from the original warehouse to the newly sized one (ruling                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
out D). The new virtual warehouse will only serve the new incoming queries. This seamless scaling process is a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
major benefit of Snowflake's cloud-based architecture, allowing for dynamic resource allocation to meet                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
changing workload demands without interrupting users. This allows for near-instant scalability, an important                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
characteristic in modern data warehousing environments.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Further reading on Snowflake Virtual Warehouses and scaling can be found in the official Snowflake                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
documentation:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
Virtual Warehouse Overview                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
Warehouse Sizing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Two users share a virtual warehouse named WH_DEV_01. When one of the users loads data, the other one                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
experiences performance issues while querying data.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
How does Snowflake recommend resolving this issue?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Scale up the existing warehouse<br>B. Create separate warehouses for each user<br>C. Create separate warehouses for each workload<br>D. Stop loading and querying data at the same time                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is C. Create separate warehouses for each workload.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
Here's why: In Snowflake, virtual warehouses are the compute resources used to execute queries and data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
loading operations. When multiple users share a single warehouse (WH_DEV_01 in this scenario), their                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
workloads compete for the same compute resources. This leads to contention, where loading data consumes                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
resources needed for querying, resulting in performance issues for the user querying the data.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
Option A, scaling up the existing warehouse, might temporarily alleviate the issue by providing more compute                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
power. However, it doesn't address the underlying problem of resource contention between different                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
workloads. Both users still share the same, albeit larger, resources and will continue to impact each other's                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
performance.Option B, creating separate warehouses for each user, could improve performance, but it is not as precise as                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
option C, because it does not necessarily reflect the workload. For instance, a user may be executing two                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
completely separate workloads, that should not contend on the same compute resources.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
Option D, stopping loading and querying simultaneously, is not a practical solution. It restricts the use of the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
system and fails to leverage Snowflake's capabilities for concurrent operations.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Creating separate warehouses for each workload (C) offers the best approach. By dedicating specific                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
warehouses for loading and querying, each workload operates within its dedicated resources. The loading                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
user will not consume the processing power of the querying user and vice versa. This isolates performance                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
issues and ensures that each task has sufficient resources for optimal efficiency. Additionally, this allows for                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
granular cost management and scaling based on the specific needs of each workload, leading to a more costeffective use of Snowflake's resources. This methodology aligns with the best practices of separating                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
compute resources by function to achieve optimal performance in a cloud data warehouse environment.

---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Why do Snowflake’s virtual warehouses have scaling policies?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. To help save extra storage costs<br>B. To help increase the performance of serverless computing features<br>C. To help control the credits consumed by a multi-cluster warehouse running in auto-scale mode<br>D. To help control the credits consumed by a multi-cluster warehouse running in maximized mode                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is C. To help control the credits consumed by a multi-cluster warehouse running in autoscale mode.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
Snowflake's virtual warehouses are designed to provide scalable compute resources. Multi-cluster                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
warehouses enhance this capability by allowing automatic scaling based on workload demands.
