<strong>C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is C: "Each virtual warehouse is a compute cluster composed of multiple compute nodes                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
allocated by Snowflake from a cloud provider." This accurately describes the core functionality of a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Snowflake virtual warehouse. Virtual warehouses are not merely logical entities; they are actual compute                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
resources provisioned within the cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure, or GCP) that Snowflake manages.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Option A is incorrect because while increasing warehouse size often boosts data loading performance, it's not                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
a guaranteed universal improvement. Factors like data file size, network throughput, and query complexity                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
also play a significant role. Simply scaling up doesn't solve all performance bottlenecks.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
Option B is wrong as each virtual warehouse operates as an independent compute cluster. They don't share                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
resources directly. This isolation ensures that workloads in one warehouse don't affect the performance of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
others, a crucial aspect of Snowflake's performance and concurrency model.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
Option D is also incorrect. Because warehouses are isolated, performance degradation in one warehouse does                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
not significantly affect others. This is a key feature ensuring a predictable performance environment for                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
concurrent workloads. This isolation is a core design tenet for cloud-based data processing systems.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
In summary, Snowflake virtual warehouses are distinct, scalable compute clusters provisioned on-demand                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
from cloud providers. They offer a balance of performance, isolation, and resource management that defines                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
Snowflake's cloud-based data platform.For further reading, consult the official Snowflake documentation:https://docs.snowflake.com/en/userguide/warehouses-overviewhttps://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/warehouses-considerations                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
If there is queueing in the virtual warehouse load monitoring chart, what should a Snowflake user do?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Decrease the warehouse size.<br>B. Decrease the MIN_CLUSTER_COUNT parameter.<br>C. Change the multi-cluster settings to add additional clusters.<br>D. Start a separate warehouse and move queued queries there.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is D. Start a separate warehouse and move queued queries there. When queueing occurs                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
in a Snowflake virtual warehouse, it signifies that the current warehouse lacks sufficient resources to handle                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
the incoming query load promptly. Option A, decreasing the warehouse size, would exacerbate the problem by                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
further limiting available compute capacity. Similarly, decreasing the MIN_CLUSTER_COUNT (option B)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
would reduce the minimum number of active clusters, making the problem worse in multi-cluster scenarios.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Option C, changing multi-cluster settings to add additional clusters, could be a valid solution for an existing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
warehouse if configured for multi-cluster mode and set to "auto-scale". However, if the warehouse is already                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
maxed out, or not in multi-cluster mode, this won't resolve the issue immediately. The most effective                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
immediate solution (option D) is to start a new warehouse and direct queued queries to it. This provides instant                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
relief by introducing fresh compute resources, effectively splitting the workload and avoiding backlog in the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
original warehouse. This approach helps ensure queries execute without excessive delay. Separating query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
loads by creating multiple warehouses based on workload patterns is a standard best practice for                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
performance optimization. This strategy allows for independent scaling and resource allocation based on                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
distinct needs. You can find more information about Snowflake warehouse sizing and multi-cluster features in                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
the official Snowflake documentation: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/warehouses and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/warehouses-multicluster.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
What are the available Snowflake scaling modes for configuring multi-cluster virtual warehouses? (Choose two.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Auto-Scale<br>B. Economy<br>C. Maximized<br>D. Scale-Out<br>E. Standard                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>A, C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct scaling modes for multi-cluster virtual warehouses in Snowflake are Auto-Scale and Maximized.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Auto-Scale mode dynamically adjusts the number of clusters based on workload demand, optimizing resource                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
usage and cost. When the workload increases, Snowflake automatically spins up additional clusters within the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
specified minimum and maximum limits. Conversely, when demand decreases, Snowflake scales down the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
number of clusters to reduce costs. This allows for efficient handling of fluctuating workloads without manual                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
intervention. Maximized mode, on the other hand, aims to maximize concurrency by running the maximum                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
number of clusters allowed for the warehouse. This is ideal when high concurrency is consistently required or                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
latency must be minimized, trading cost-efficiency for performance. It does not dynamically adjust clusters                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
based on demand like Auto-Scale.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Economy mode is not a supported scaling mode; instead, the cost is generally considered in the choice of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
sizing or the auto-scaling behavior. Scale-Out is a general computing term, not specific to Snowflake’s multicluster scaling. While Snowflake uses scale-out principles, the mode isn’t named as such. Standard is also not                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
a defined scaling mode in Snowflake's multi-cluster settings. The available modes directly influence how                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Snowflake manages resources to accommodate fluctuating user concurrency and query load. Choosing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
between Auto-Scale and Maximized depends on the specific performance needs and budgetary constraints of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
the workload.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
Snowflake documentation on multi-cluster warehouses: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/userguide/warehouses-multicluster                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Snowflake documentation on scaling warehouses: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/warehousesscaling                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
If queries start to queue in a multi-cluster virtual warehouse an additional compute cluster starts immediately                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
under what setting?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Auto-scale mode<br>B. Maximized mode<br>C. Economy scaling policy<br>D. Standard scaling policy                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The Correct answer is ["D"]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
What action can a user take to address query concurrency issues?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Enable the search optimization service.<br>B. Enable the query acceleration service.<br>C. Add additional clusters to the virtual warehouse.<br>D. Resize the virtual warehouse to a larger instance size.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is C. Add additional clusters to the virtual warehouse. Query concurrency issues in                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
Snowflake arise when numerous queries attempt to execute simultaneously, exceeding the processing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
capacity of the current virtual warehouse configuration. Adding more clusters to a multi-cluster warehouse                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
addresses this by providing more compute resources to handle the workload. A multi-cluster warehouse                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
dynamically scales out by starting additional clusters when needed, allowing for parallel processing of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
concurrent queries. This avoids queries queuing and experiencing delays. Option A, enabling the search                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
optimization service, primarily speeds up queries by optimizing data access paths for frequently filtered data,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
not by adding compute capacity for concurrent queries. Option B, enabling the query acceleration service, is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
beneficial for specific types of complex queries with large datasets, not for overall concurrency issues. OptionD, resizing the virtual warehouse to a larger instance, provides more compute resources within a single                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
cluster, which can help, but doesn't directly address concurrency through parallel processing like adding                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
more clusters. Multi-cluster warehouses are designed to handle multiple concurrent users or queries by                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
scaling horizontally, thereby improving overall performance under heavy loads. Snowflake automatically                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
manages and distributes workloads across these clusters. Therefore, adding clusters specifically and directly                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
tackles query concurrency bottlenecks most effectively.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Further Research:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Snowflake Documentation on Multi-Cluster Warehouses                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Snowflake Documentation on Warehouse Scaling                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Understanding Snowflake Concurrency                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
What are the recommended steps to address poor SQL query performance due to data spilling? (Choose two.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Clone the base table.<br>B. Fetch required attributes only.<br>C. Use a larger virtual warehouse.<br>D. Process the data in smaller batches.<br>E. Add another cluster in the virtual warehouse.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>C, D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Let's analyze why options C and D are the correct responses to address SQL query performance                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
degradation caused by data spilling in Snowflake. Data spilling occurs when intermediate results                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
during query processing exceed the memory allocated to a virtual warehouse, forcing Snowflake                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
to utilize slower local storage. This significantly impacts performance. Option C, "Use a larger                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
virtual warehouse," directly addresses the core issue. A larger virtual warehouse provides more                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
memory resources, accommodating larger intermediate result sets and reducing the likelihood of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
spilling to local disk.
