</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
What are key characteristics of virtual warehouses in Snowflake? (Choose two.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Warehouses that are multi-cluster can have nodes of different sizes.<br>B. Warehouses can be started and stopped at any time.<br>C. Warehouses can be resized at any time, even while running.<br>D. Warehouses are billed on a per-minute usage basis.<br>E. Warehouses can only be used for querying and cannot be used for data loading.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>B, C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer, B and C, highlights two crucial aspects of Snowflake's virtual warehouses.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
Virtual warehouses in Snowflake are designed for flexibility and resource management. B,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
"Warehouses can be started and stopped at any time," is fundamental to Snowflake's pay-as-yougo model. Users only incur compute costs when a warehouse is actively running. This allows for                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
efficient resource allocation, enabling users to pause compute resources during periods of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
inactivity and avoid unnecessary charges. This capability aligns with the core tenets of cloud                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
computing, emphasizing on-demand resource availability. Option C, "Warehouses can be resized                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
at any time, even while running," is another critical feature that contributes to the platform’s                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
elasticity. The ability to scale the compute capacity of a warehouse up or down in real-time,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
without interrupting active queries or operations, is vital for managing fluctuating workloads. This                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
feature ensures optimal performance during peak demand and cost-efficiency during lulls, which                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
is characteristic of cloud platforms. Options A, D, and E are incorrect. Option A is false because all                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
nodes within a multi-cluster warehouse are the same size. Option D, although Snowflake uses a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
per-second billing model, isn't a key characteristic of warehouses themselves but rather a billing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
practice. Option E is incorrect because warehouses are used for various tasks including both                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
querying and data loading operations.Here are some authoritative links for further research:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Snowflake Documentation on Virtual Warehouses: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/userguide/warehouses                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Snowflake Documentation on Warehouse Resizing: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/userguide/warehouses-resizing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
Snowflake Documentation on Warehouse Billing: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/costoptimizing-warehouses                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
If a multi-cluster warehouse is using an economy scaling policy, how long will queries wait in the queue before                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
another cluster is started?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. 1 minute<br>B. 2 minutes<br>C. 6 minutes<br>D. 8 minutes                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is C. 6 minutes. Snowflake's multi-cluster warehouses with an "Economy"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
scaling policy are designed to minimize costs by adding compute resources more conservatively                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
than the "Auto-scale" policy. When query load increases and the existing clusters become                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
saturated, Snowflake queues incoming queries. With the Economy scaling policy, Snowflake will                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
wait for approximately 6 minutes of queued query load before initiating the start-up of an                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
additional cluster. This delay provides an opportunity for the existing resources to handle the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
increased load if it's only a temporary spike. If the queue persists, then the additional cluster                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
begins initialization. This conservative approach prevents unnecessary resource allocation and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
ensures that new clusters are only activated when they are needed. The 6-minute threshold                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
allows for a balance between performance and cost-effectiveness. In contrast, the Auto-scale                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
policy initiates new clusters much faster, prioritizing responsiveness over cost savings. The                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
specific timing of 6 minutes for the Economy policy is a deliberate setting within Snowflake's                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
system architecture to achieve its intended purpose. This ensures optimal resource management                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
and cost control, making it an ideal choice when cost is a primary concern.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
For more information on Snowflake's multi-cluster warehouses and scaling policies, refer to the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
official Snowflake documentation:https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/warehousesmulticlusterhttps://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/warehouses-scaling                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
What is one of the benefits of using a multi-cluster virtual warehouse?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. It will speed up data loading.<br>B. It will reduce the cost of running the warehouse.<br>C. It will automatically increase the warehouse size as needed.<br>D. It will automatically start and stop additional clusters as needed.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is D: It will automatically start and stop additional clusters as needed. Multicluster virtual warehouses in Snowflake offer enhanced concurrency and workload management.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
Unlike single-cluster warehouses, which can become overloaded with high demand, multi-cluster                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
warehouses dynamically adjust their resources based on current workloads. When demand                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
increases, Snowflake automatically spins up additional clusters to handle the influx, ensuring                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
consistent query performance. Conversely, when demand decreases, Snowflake automatically                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
suspends these extra clusters, optimizing resource usage and reducing costs. Option A is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
incorrect because data loading speed is primarily dependent on warehouse size and network                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
throughput, not multi-cluster functionality itself. Option B is incorrect because while multicluster warehouses help manage costs by scaling resources up and down, they don't inherently                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
reduce the cost of running the warehouse; they optimize resource utilization. Option C is also                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
incorrect; while multi-cluster warehouses provide dynamic scalability via adding/removing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
clusters, they do not change the size of individual clusters. They add whole new clusters of the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
specified size. Multi-cluster setups primarily focus on elasticity and concurrency, enabling                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Snowflake to handle a varying number of concurrent user queries effectively. This automatic                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
scaling behavior, a core concept of cloud elasticity, is essential for ensuring applications remainresponsive even during peak times.

---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
When should a multi-cluster virtual warehouse be used in Snowflake?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. When queuing is delaying query execution on the warehouse<br>B. When there is significant disk spilling shown on the Query Profile<br>C. When dynamic vertical scaling is being used in the warehouse<br>D. When there are no concurrent queries running on the warehouse                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>A</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is A. When queuing is delaying query execution on the warehouse. Multicluster virtual warehouses in Snowflake are designed to handle concurrency and workload                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
variation, not to address performance bottlenecks within a single warehouse. Queuing delays                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
indicate that a single warehouse is overloaded and cannot process all incoming queries                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
simultaneously, suggesting a need for horizontal scaling. Multi-cluster warehouses automatically                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
add more compute clusters (identical warehouses) when queries start to queue, distributing the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
workload across multiple resources. This prevents long wait times and improves overall                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
throughput. Option B, significant disk spilling, suggests a need for a larger warehouse, not                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
additional clusters, to handle in-memory data needs. Dynamic vertical scaling (Option C) also                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
addresses resource issues but within the same warehouse size, not multiple clusters. Option D, no                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
concurrent queries, makes multi-cluster redundant as there is no need for increased concurrency.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Therefore, multi-cluster warehouses directly address delays caused by queuing, while the other                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
options target different performance concerns.
