Therefore, increasing the maximum number of clusters is the most effective approach to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
reduce queuing on a multi-cluster virtual warehouse.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Authoritative Links:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Snowflake Documentation on Multi-cluster Warehouses:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/warehouses-multicluster.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
Snowflake Documentation on Warehouse Scaling: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/userguide/warehouses-scaling.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
What is the MOST cost-effective way to resolve memory spillage in a virtual warehouse?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Enable automatic clustering.<br>B. Enable the query acceleration service.<br>C. Enable the search optimization service.<br>D. Convert to a Snowpark-optimized warehouse.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is D. Convert to a Snowpark-optimized warehouse.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Memory spillage occurs when a virtual warehouse doesn't have enough RAM to process                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
a query's data, forcing it to use slower disk storage. While options like auto-clustering                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
(A) address data organization and query performance through micro-partitioning, they                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
don't directly alleviate RAM limitations during query execution. Query acceleration (B)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
and search optimization (C) focus on speeding up specific types of queries but don't                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
directly address fundamental memory constraints.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Snowpark-optimized warehouses, on the other hand, are specifically designed to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
execute data processing logic using the Snowpark API within the Snowflake                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
environment. This allows for pushdown of computations, meaning that data is processed                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
closer to the storage layer before being loaded into memory on the warehouse. By                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
minimizing the amount of data loaded into RAM, they significantly reduce the likelihood                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
of memory spillage. Snowpark's ability to leverage distributed processing on the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Snowflake infrastructure further enhances resource efficiency by distributing the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
workload. This architecture allows operations to be carried out more effectively across                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
many nodes. These optimizations make Snowpark-optimized warehouses the most costeffective approach for addressing memory spillage. They inherently improve efficiency                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
and resource management related to data processing within a warehouse, rather than                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
adjusting how the storage or searching works.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
For further research on this topic, you can explore the following resources:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Snowflake Documentation on Snowpark: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/developerguide/snowpark/index                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Snowflake Documentation on Virtual Warehouses: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/userguide/warehouses                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Snowflake Documentation on Query Profiling (for understanding spillage):https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/ui-query-profile                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Which type of workload is recommended for Snowpark-optimized virtual warehouses?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Workloads with ad hoc analytics<br>B. Workloads that have large memory requirements<br>C. Workloads with unpredictable data volumes for each query<br>D. Workloads that are queried with small table scans and selective filters                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>B</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is B. Workloads that have large memory requirements. Snowparkoptimized virtual warehouses are designed to efficiently handle computations that are                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
memory-intensive. This is because Snowpark allows for data processing within the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Snowflake environment using languages like Python and Scala, which can leverage inmemory data structures and complex algorithms that demand significant RAM. Option A                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
(ad hoc analytics) is typically suited for standard virtual warehouses that handle SQL                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
queries directly and don't inherently necessitate extensive memory usage. Option C(unpredictable data volumes) would be best managed with auto-scaling features in                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
standard warehouses, not specifically optimized for memory. Option D (small table scans                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
and selective filters) are again more efficiently handled by traditional SQL-based                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
processing in standard warehouses, relying more on query optimization techniques than                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
on large memory allocations. Snowpark’s processing model, involving the transfer of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
data to compute nodes in the virtual warehouse, benefits significantly from larger                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
memory configurations to store intermediate results and reduce the need for disk I/O.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
This in-memory approach leads to faster processing for workloads with substantial data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
processing needs within Snowpark, which include tasks like machine learning model                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
training, large data transformations, and complex analytical computations. Therefore,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
the recommendation of Snowpark-optimized warehouses for workloads with large                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
memory requirements is tied to their ability to better support these scenarios with                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
efficient in-memory computation. The Snowflake documentation also supports this                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
direction in the description of Snowpark optimized virtual warehouses.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
Here are some authoritative links for further research:
