Snowflake Documentation on Snowpark: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/developerguide/snowpark/index                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Snowflake Blog on Snowpark: https://www.snowflake.com/blog/tag/snowpark/                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
What action should be taken if a large number of concurrent queries are queued in a virtual warehouse?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Scale-up by resizing the warehouse.<br>B. Scale-out with a multi-cluster warehouse.<br>C. Disable auto-suspend on the warehouse.<br>D. Enable auto-resume on the warehouse.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>B</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The Correct answer is ["B"]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
A query is using more credits than expected. The Query Profile shows that a majority of the query execution is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
spent on remote disk I/O.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
How can this be prevented in the future?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Convert the virtual warehouse to Maximized mode.<br>B. Increase the size of the virtual warehouse.<br>C. Increase the auto suspend time in the virtual warehouse.<br>D. Increase the number of clusters in the virtual warehouse.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>B</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is B. Increase the size of the virtual warehouse.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Here's a detailed justification:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The problem statement highlights that the query is spending a significant amount of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
time on remote disk I/O and consuming more credits than expected. Remote disk I/O                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
occurs when the data needed for the query is not readily available in the virtual                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
warehouse's cache (local storage attached to the compute nodes). This forces the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
warehouse to retrieve the data from Snowflake's remote storage layer (which is slowerand more expensive).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Increasing the size of the virtual warehouse provides more memory and local disk space                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
to the compute nodes. This larger cache can hold more data, reducing the frequency of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
remote disk I/O operations. By keeping the frequently accessed data in the local cache,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
the query can execute faster and more efficiently, leading to reduced credit                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
consumption. A larger warehouse has more CPU and memory allocated, further aiding                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
with query processing.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
Option A, "Convert the virtual warehouse to Maximized mode," is incorrect. Maximized                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
mode is generally used to minimize latency and maximize performance for workloads                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
sensitive to even minor performance delays. While it can reduce latency, it doesn't                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
specifically address the remote disk I/O issue; it does not have direct cache sizing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
implications and does not lower the frequency of I/O requests.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
Option C, "Increase the auto suspend time in the virtual warehouse," is incorrect. Autosuspend controls how long a warehouse remains active when idle. It doesn't affect query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
performance or remote disk I/O. Extending it only prevents the warehouse from shutting                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
down unnecessarily.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Option D, "Increase the number of clusters in the virtual warehouse," relates to multicluster warehouses which handles concurrency. Scaling out the number of clusters                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
increases concurrency handling but is not related to the initial query performance issues                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
related to disk I/O as described.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Therefore, increasing the virtual warehouse size is the most effective way to prevent the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
excessive remote disk I/O and improve query performance, thus reducing credit                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
consumption.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Further Research:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Snowflake Virtual Warehouse Sizing: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/userguide/warehouses-overview.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Snowflake Query Profile: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/ui-queryprofile.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
A single cluster virtual warehouse has no free resources.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
What will happen to new queries that are run against this warehouse?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. The queries will be assigned to another virtual warehouse.<br>B. The queries will be skipped.<br>C. The queries will be placed in a queue.<br>D. The warehouse will automatically resize and execute the queries.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The correct answer is C: The queries will be placed in a queue.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
Here's why: When a Snowflake virtual warehouse is fully utilized and lacks the resources                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
to immediately execute incoming queries, Snowflake doesn't simply discard or redirect                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
them. Instead, it leverages a queuing mechanism. This mechanism ensures that queries                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
are held in a waiting state until resources become available.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
Option A is incorrect because Snowflake doesn't automatically assign queries to a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
different warehouse if the current warehouse is overloaded. Instead, multi-cluster                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
warehouses, if configured, may begin using the additional clusters within the same                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
warehouse definition. However, the question implies that the user is using a single                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
cluster warehouse.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Option B is also incorrect as Snowflake prioritizes executing queries rather than skipping                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
them. Skipping would lead to data loss and incomplete operations.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Option D is partially correct; Snowflake can automatically resize if configured to autoscale. However, this takes time. During the resizing process, queries will still be queued.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Crucially, the question doesn't state that auto-scaling is enabled. Also, a single-cluster                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
warehouse cannot resize. Since auto-scaling is not explicitly stated in the question, we                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
need to assume the warehouse will not resize and must queue the queries.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
The queuing behavior allows Snowflake to maintain data integrity and avoid data loss.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
Snowflake's architecture is designed to handle bursts of activity and ensure all queries                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
eventually execute. Queuing is a standard practice in database management systems to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
manage resource contention.Snowflake Documentation on Virtual                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
WarehousesSnowflake Documentation on Query QueuingSnowflake Documentation on                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Auto-Scaling                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Use of which virtual warehouse or warehouse configuration will improve the performance of workloads that have                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
large memory requirements, such as Machine Learning (ML) training using a stored procedure?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
A. Snowpark-optimized warehouse<br>B. Standard warehouse<br>C. Multi-cluster warehouse<br>D. Serverless compute                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
<summary><strong>✅ Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
<strong>A</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
The Correct answer is ["A"]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
</details>
